action.action-desc: Ms. Meng introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the Secretary of Education to translate the FAFSA into foreign languages, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the FAFSA Translation Act.

section.header: Translation of FAFSA into foreign languages
section.text: Section 483(a) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1090(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: translate the forms developed under this subsection into not fewer than 11 foreign languages, to be determined by the Secretary; and
make the translated forms available to applicants in paper and electronic formats.

section.text: The amendment made by section 2 shall take effect on the date that is five years after the date of the enactment of this Act.
